mil3.7.2:0.3: Question on Obtaining Mindfulness on a Quality of the Buddha
mil3.7.2:1.3: ‘One could do evil for a hundred years, but at the time of death might obtain a single mindful moment on a quality of the Buddha, and thus arise in the realm of the devas,’ I don’t believe this. And then you said, ‘One might arise in a hell realm by killing one person,’ this too I don’t believe.”
mil3.7.2:2.1: “What do you think, your majesty, could even a small stone float on the water without a boat?”
mil3.7.2:2.3: “But, your majesty, could even a load of a hundred stones loaded onto a boat float on the water?”
mil3.7.2:2.5: “Your majesty, skilled deeds should be considered as like a boat.”
